TEXT.TITLE: ARCHER-DANIELS <ADM> DENIES RUMOR
TEXT.BODY: Archer-Daniels-Midland Co denied a report that it is interested in acquiring International Minerals and Chemical Corp (IGL). "We have no interest in International Minerals or any of its divisions," a spokesman told Reuters. "We've had no conversations with them." USA Today reported that Archer-Daniels-Midland might be seeking a hostile takeover of International Minerals. Reuter
